attributes.action: Decline Britian First's application to register as a political party
attributes.additional_details:
Britian First's often religiously extreme, bigoted and prejudice views have no place in our society, never mind our politics. 

No platform for hate. 


Source: https://www.britainfirst.org/breaking-britain-first-registers-as-political-party
attributes.background:
Far Right hate group, Britian First, have made a return to social media with a new Facebook page announcing that they have registered as a political party. This registration has not yet been accepted. 
We call upon the government to refuse this request.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Electoral Commission, which is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
